Two sermons lately preached at the Assizes in St. Maries Church in Leicester the former March 23, 1670, the latter July 27, 1671 / by Robert Harrison. Harrison, Robert, fl. 1648-1672.
[1], 63 p.
Printed and are to be sold by Tho. Sawbridge, London : 1672.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
